segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) includes four server roles that can be run on one or more computers.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) includes four server roles that can be run on one or more computers.

segment.source: However, only two MBAM Server features require the update to support installation of the MBAM 1.0 language release and the MBAM Policy Template.
segment.target: However, only two MBAM Server features require the update to support installation of the MBAM 1.0 language release and the MBAM Policy Template.

segment.source: To update all three of the required MBAM features to be installed on one computer, perform the steps described in this topic.
segment.target: To update all three of the required MBAM features to be installed on one computer, perform the steps described in this topic.

segment.source: To install the MBAM language update on a single server
segment.target: To install the MBAM language update on a single server

segment.source: Open the Internet Information Services (IIS) Management Console, go to Sites, and then shut down the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring website.
segment.target: Open the Internet Information Services (IIS) Management Console, go to Sites, and then shut down the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring website.

segment.source: Edit the bindings for the MBAM website, and then temporarily modify the bindings of the site.
segment.target: Edit the bindings for the MBAM website, and then temporarily modify the bindings of the site.

segment.source: For example, change the port from 443 to 9443.
segment.target: For example, change the port from 443 to 9443.

segment.source: Locate and run the MBAM setup wizard (MBAMsetup.exe) and select the following three features:
segment.target: Locate and run the MBAM setup wizard (MBAMsetup.exe) and select the following three features:

segment.source: Compliance and Audit Reports
segment.target: Compliance and Audit Reports

segment.source: Administration and Monitoring Server
segment.target: Administration and Monitoring Server

segment.source: Group Policy Templates
segment.target: Group Policy Templates

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The MBAM server features must be updated in the following order: Compliance and Audit Reports first, then Administration and Monitoring Server.
segment.target: The MBAM server features must be updated in the following order: Compliance and Audit Reports first, then Administration and Monitoring Server.

segment.source: The Group Policy templates can be updated at any time without concern for sequence.
segment.target: The Group Policy templates can be updated at any time without concern for sequence.

segment.source: After you upgrade the server database, open the IIS Management Console and review the bindings of the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring website.
segment.target: After you upgrade the server database, open the IIS Management Console and review the bindings of the Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring website.

segment.source: Delete one of the bindings and ensure that the remaining binding has the correct host name, certificate, and port number for the MBAM enterprise configuration.
segment.target: Delete one of the bindings and ensure that the remaining binding has the correct host name, certificate, and port number for the MBAM enterprise configuration.

segment.source: Restart the MBAM website.
segment.target: Restart the MBAM website.

segment.target: Test the MBAM website functionality:

segment.source: Open the MBAM web interface and ensure you can fetch a recovery key for a client.
segment.target: Open the MBAM web interface and ensure you can fetch a recovery key for a client.

segment.source: Enforce encryption of a new or manually decrypted client computer.
segment.target: Enforce encryption of a new or manually decrypted client computer.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The MBAM client opens only if it can communicate with the Recovery and Hardware database.
segment.target: The MBAM client opens only if it can communicate with the Recovery and Hardware database.
